original_text: While Gallio was proconsul of Achaia, the Jews of Corinth made a united attack on Paul and brought him to the place of judgment.
korean_text: 갈리오가 아가야 총독 되었을 때에 유대인이 일제히 일어나 바울을 대적하여 법정으로 데리고 가서

sentences.original_text: While Gallio was proconsul of Achaia
Jews of Corinth made a united attack on Paul
and brought him to place of judgment
